titles.title: A bill to extend duty-free treatment to certain chemicals.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 1/8/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to grant duty-free treatment of: (1) 2,2-bis-(4-Cyanatophenyl); (2) aminoethylphenylpyrazole (phenylmethylaminopyrazole); (3) benzethonium chloride; (4) malononitrile; (5) metaldehyde; and (6) paraldehyde. Reduces the duty on other nitriles. Provides for specified staged rate reductions.
